# Designer Reference (Supplementary)

Authoritative rules are in `.github/agents/Designer.agent.md` and SSOT docs.

## UI State Checklist

- Loading
- Empty
- Success
- Error
- Disabled/permission-limited

## Accessibility Checklist (Compact)

- Keyboard navigation complete
- Focus visible and logical
- Sufficient contrast
- Labels/automation properties present

## MVVM Boundaries

- View: rendering and bindings
- ViewModel: state, commands, orchestration
- No business logic in code-behind
